p: The CD45 immunoreactive area was most robust in the dermis, with a multifocal distribution, found in participants with CLE and at very low levels in HV skin. Per cent CD45 immunoreactive area correlated with IFN mRNA gene cluster expression (dermis, rho=0.74, p=0.002; online supplemental figure S4B). Across disease groups there was enough of a dynamic range in CD45 immunoreactivity and IFN gene expression to provide a positive correlation between these biomarkers.
